summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Midvale Avenue, from North 39th Street to North 50th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8177 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
